# Estimate species richness at given pH - solution

## R-code:

``` rsplus
vltava.env <- read.delim ('http://www.davidzeleny.net/anadat-r/data-download/vltava-env.txt')
lm.1 <- lm (SPEC.NO ~ pH, data = vltava.env)
summary (lm.1)  # to get R2 (Multiple R-squared), F-value (F-statistic) and P-value
# Call:
#   lm(formula = SPEC.NO ~ pH, data = vltava.env)
# 
# Residuals:
#   Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
# -20.743  -5.941  -1.648   5.624  31.232 
# 
# Coefficients:
#   Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
# (Intercept)  -12.943      6.491  -1.994    0.049 *  
#   pH             9.569      1.525   6.276 1.03e-08 ***
#   ---
#   Signif. codes:  0 ‘***’ 0.001 ‘**’ 0.01 ‘*’ 0.05 ‘.’ 0.1 ‘ ’ 1
# 
# Residual standard error: 8.752 on 95 degrees of freedom
# Multiple R-squared:  0.2931,  Adjusted R-squared:  0.2856 
# F-statistic: 39.39 on 1 and 95 DF,  p-value: 1.031e-08

predict (lm.1, newdata = list (pH = 4.5))
# $fit
# 1 
# 30.11731 
# 
# $se.fit
# [1] 0.9876333
# 
# $df
# [1] 95
# 
# $residual.scale
# [1] 8.751931
```
